creator: dylans@xs4all.nl
text:
org.apache.jasper.compiler.PluginGenerator extracts the name attribute
from the plugin tag, but does generate any HTML for this attribute
this makes it difficult to use the plugin tag in combination with
javascript and inter applet communication.

As far as I know the name attribute should be exported to HTML.

It might also be useful to export the name attribute to the HTML id attribute
since this makes scripting easier.

creator: craig.mcclanahan@sun.com
text: Fixed in nightly build 20010918 (and Tomcat 4.0 final release).
